Wichita.Wichita Area Technical College:
Wichita Area Technical College is a public institution that offers more than 100 programs of study in Healthcare, Aviation, Manufacturing, Design, Business, Police Science and Transferable General Education. Degree and certificate options include Associate of Applied Science, Technical Certificate and Certificate of Completion.
WATC is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission (HLC), coordinated by the []Kansas Board of Regents]] (KBOR) and governed by the Sedgwick County Technical Education and Training Authority Board (SCTETA).
